abstract: Timing is the bane of those who would be innovators. Get it right and you’ll be toasted. Get it wrong and you’re just plain toast.
snippet: Timing is the bane of those who would be innovators. Get it right and you’ll be toasted. Get it wrong and you’re just plain toast.
lead_paragraph: TIMING is the bane of those who would be innovators. Get it right and you’ll be toasted. Get it wrong and you’re just plain toast. Nobody knows that better than T. J. Kang, a software entrepreneur who hopes that after one decade and two failures, he may be in line for a sip of Champagne.

headline.main: Recasting the Word Processor for a Connected World
headline.print_headline: Recasting the Word Processor for a Connected World
